MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area today caused by a flooded network box and we apologise for this. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.06pm on the 7th December 2020.
